title: Mt. Gilead Cruise-In
description: Join us downtown for the 4th annual Mt. Gilead cruise-ins—first Sundays, March–November, 12–4pm. Entry is free and food trucks will be onsite. Roll in, line up on Main, and enjoy a packed afternoon of classics, modern muscle, and community vibes.

title: Mt. Gilead Cruise-In
description: Join us downtown for the 4th annual Mt. Gilead cruise-ins—first Sundays, March–November, 12–4pm. Entry is free and food trucks will be onsite. Bring the family and make a day of it!

title: Hot Rods and Hops
description: Hot Rods and Hops is back! Join @rev_fast at Late Apex Storage the 3rd Friday of each month.

title: Cars & Coffee - Concord
description: The Charlotte Motor Speedway and Cars and  Coffee Concord host a true Cars & Coffee event at the Speedway. This event is currently Charlotte’s largest event while Cars and Coffee Charlotte looks for a new location.

title: Caffeine and Chrome
description: Gateway Classic Cars Charlotte hosts a monthly car show on the last Saturday of every month. All car enthusiasts, makes and models are welcome for this FREE event. This event happens at all 21 event showrooms across the USA every last Saturday. Car dealership  This is a family and pet friendly event.

title: Cars & Coffee in the Park
description: Bring your prized vehicle and your community for a great morning! Here is a reminder to keep it fun and safe for everyone—respect others and the venue. Reckless actions, including burnouts, excessive revving, or blasting loud music, won’t be tolerated. Be the enthusiast everyone wants to meet!

title: Downtown Monroe Cruise-In
description: Get ready for a classic car night out in Historic Downtown Monroe! The Downtown Cruise-In series returns for the 2025 season, happening every second Friday of the month from April through October, rain or shine.Car dealership  Hosted by the City of Monroe Parks & Recreation, these free events bring together families, friends, and car lovers from across the region. Main Street fills up with classic cars, hot rods, muscle cars, motorcycles, and more, each month spotlighting a different theme.  Bring your ride or just come to admire the chrome, custom paint, and vintage vibes!

title: MTCC A&F's Classic Car Show
description: 3rd annual Classic Car Show sponsored by the MTCC A&F! All proceeds will support the academic and technological needs of students, instructors, staff, and the offerings qualifying at More Than Conquerors College , a local 501(c)(3) non-profit.

title: Cruise-In – Craft Burger n’ Tap
description: Easygoing cruise-in on the west side of Lake Norman in Denver, NC—good vibes, great burgers, and a friendly mix of classics, modern muscle, and daily drivers.

title: Exotics & Espresso
description: Join  Lamborghini Charlotte for the highly anticipated return of Exotics & Espresso! From 10 AM – 12 PM off E Independence Blvd, Charlotte’s top Lamborghini and  exotic car enthusiasts will gather for an unforgettable morning. Expect a packed lot, incredible cars, and a great community.

title: Classic Cruisers Monthly
description: A relaxed Sunday afternoon with the Classic Cruisers of Monroe. This group has been meeting the 3rd Sunday of each month for generations. This is a free event open to all and can be found on the Classic Cruisers of Monroe FB page.

title: Charlotte Auto Show
description: Free admission for children ages 12 and under for the entirety of the show.

title: Cruise-In – Craft Burger n’ Tap
description: Easygoing cruise-in on the west side of Lake Norman in Denver, NC—good vibes, great burgers, and a friendly mix of classics, modern muscle, and daily drivers.

title: Fly High Lexington Motoring Expo
description: The 2nd Annual Fly High Lexington Motoring Expo Date: Saturday, October 4th, 2025 * Rain Rate: Saturday, October 11th, 2025 Time: 11am - 3pm Location: 1673 Aviation Way | Lexington, NC | 27292 * Trophies & Awards * Car / Truck / Bike Show * Plane Fly-Ins * Food Trucks * Vendors & Sponsors * Live Entertainment * Giveaways & Door Prizes * Raffles * Games & Contests * RC Demos * Special Guests * $5 per Person (General Admission Fee) * Kids 12 & UNDER = FREE *$20 per Vehicle (Show Registration Fee & Includes Driver ONLY)

venue.name: Fly High Lexington/Davidson County Executive Airport

title: Waxhaw Coffee Cruisers – Harris Teeter
description: All are welcome! FUN, FREE, and FRIENDLY—free donuts & coffee, raffle, vendors, and more.

title: Mint Hill Cruise In
description: Classic Cruisers is proud to post (not host) this great event. Huge turnout. Free. Contact Doug Pressley @704-719-6662.

title: Mint Hill Cruise In
description: Classic Cruisers is proud to post (not host) this great event. Huge turnout. Free. Contact Doug Pressley @704-719-6662.

title: First Friday Night Cruise In
description: York County Monte Carlo Cruisers present a night of cars, music, and food. All makes & models welcome!

title: Kruise In & Car Show
description: Buckle up—the most anticipated car show of the year is rolling in. Expect high-octane action, tire-shredding burnout contests, roaring dyno pulls, eye-catching custom builds, a full spread of food trucks, family fun, and even hot-air balloon rides.

title: AmeriCarna LIVE
description: Ray Evernham’s 13th annual AmeriCarna LIVE, presented by Trane Technologies, MSC Industrial Supply Co., and Featherlite Trailers. Open to all cars at Trane’s North American HQ in Davidson. Car entrants gate 7am; spectators 9am. Pre-reg $25 through 10/31 ($30 after). Spectators $5; kids <6 free. VIP from $200. 100% of proceeds support the Evernham Family Racing for a Reason Foundation and IGNITE for young adults with high-functioning autism.

title: Matthews Cruise In – North End
description: Classic Cruisers hosts a family-friendly cruise-in at Jet's Pizza. Starts ~1pm, prize drawings around 3:30pm. Last Sunday monthly (weather permitting).

title: Matthews Cruise In – North End
description: Classic Cruisers hosts a family-friendly cruise-in at Jet's Pizza. Starts ~1pm, prize drawings around 3:30pm. Last Sunday monthly (weather permitting).

title: Throttle Thursdays – Murto Made Mooresville
description: Bike night & cruise-in—ride ’em or drive ’em. Live music, a rotating food truck lineup, and a motorcycle-forward meet that still welcomes everything from exotics to hot rods. Last Thursday nights, April–October.

title: Cars & Coffee
description: Join us for Classic Cars and Coffee. Fuel up with breakfast and admire the lineup. Free, parking onsite, welcoming crowd.

title: Cars & Coffee
description: Join us for Classic Cars and Coffee. Fuel up with breakfast and admire the lineup. Free, parking onsite, welcoming crowd.

title: Cars & Coffee
description: Join us for Classic Cars and Coffee. Fuel up with breakfast and admire the lineup. Free, parking onsite, welcoming crowd.

title: Car & Truck Meet
description: Kick off your Saturday in Indian Trail near Monroe with exotics, classic cars, trucks, and daily drivers. Easy in-and-out parking, chill vibes, and plenty of spots to grab coffee. Come early, stroll the rows, and talk builds—newcomers welcome.

title: Waxhaw Coffee Cruisers – Harris Teeter
description: All are welcome! FUN, FREE, and FRIENDLY—free donuts & coffee, raffle, vendors, and more.

title: Fast Cars + Firearms
description: Exotic car show meets live-fire demos—featuring Atlas Gunworks, Cardinal Arms, Race City Defense, and CNC Gunworks. Ride in, check out the builds, and experience range demos. Free, rain or shine.

title: Mustang & All Ford Show
description: Meet Steve Saleen! He’ll be signing autographs on posters, books, parts, and cars. Big Ford gathering—vintage to modern—with awards, vendors, and plenty of parking.

title: Oakboro Cruise-In
description: Showcase of power with an evening tire-smoke session (7–8:30). No ATVs or side-by-sides. Family-friendly downtown hangout.

title: Oakboro Cruise-In
description: Showcase of power with an evening tire-smoke session (7–8:30). No ATVs or side-by-sides. Family-friendly downtown hangout.

title: Cars & Coffee Rock Hill
description: Come enjoy great coffee, check out an awesome variety of cars, and hang with fellow enthusiasts. From classics to exotics, imports to domestics—everyone is welcome. Bring your ride, grab a cup, and be part of the Rock Hill community!

title: Cars @ Brooklyns
description: All cars welcome in Concord. Easy Saturday morning meet; pizza window opens after 11am—hang for a slice and talk builds.

title: Southminster Free-for-All Car Show & Craft Fair
description: Southminster’s third annual, free-for-all car show and craft fair—plus a silent auction benefiting Tim Tebow’s Night to Shine. A prom-like celebration for people with special needs in the Gastonia area. Bring the family, stroll the craft vendors, and enjoy a welcoming community event.

title: Sandhills Motoring Cars & Coffee
description: Join us for our monthly Cars & Coffee in the Village of Pinehurst from 9am to 11am. Meet fellow enthusiasts, sip something good from The Villager Deli, and enjoy an easy Sunday lineup.

title: Exotics & Espresso
description: Join  Lamborghini Charlotte for the highly anticipated return of Exotics & Espresso! From 10 AM – 12 PM off E Independence Blvd, Charlotte’s top Lamborghini and  exotic car enthusiasts will gather for an unforgettable morning. Expect a packed lot, incredible cars, and a great community.

title: Waxhaw Coffee Cruisers – Harris Teeter
description: All are welcome! FUN, FREE, and FRIENDLY—free donuts & coffee, raffle, vendors, and more.

title: Cars & Coffee Rock Hill – Knowledge Perk Coffee
description: Fresh pours and fresh builds—Rock Hill’s morning meetup brings out everything from classics and exotics to imports and daily drivers. Bring your ride, grab a cup, and link up with locals—easy parking and welcoming vibes.

title: Annual Fall Cruise In – AutoBarn Classic Cars
description: Join the AutoBarn in Concord for a spooktacular day of chrome and candy at their annual Classic Car Show and Trunk-or-Treat! This year it lands the day after Halloween—expect family-friendly fun, sweet rides, and loads of photo ops.

title: Fall Bash Auto Event
description: The 3rd Annual Fall Bash Auto Event—FREE community event with a big-tent car mix, family activities, and good vibes. Roll in, walk the rows, and meet fellow enthusiasts in Clemmons.

title: Grand Opening – Visible Auto Lab
description: Grand opening for Visible Auto Lab—a custom and exotic car shop in Charlotte. Mini car show, food trucks, and giveaways including a full wrap, starlight headliner, and ambient lighting package.
